title: Wrangler Men's Free to Stretch Relaxed Fit Jeans
description: RELAXED FIT. These jeans feature a roomier fit through the seat and thigh for complete comfort and a straight leg opening for a streamlined look.
FLEX COMFORT. Made with a comfortable cotton-stretch blend, these jeans allow you to move throughout your day without restriction.

SUSTAINABLY MADE. At Wrangler, We Care about the planet and the people that call it home. That's why we made these pants with 100% sustainable cotton and renewable energy, saving water and reducing energy use.
FIVE POCKET STYLING. This jean is constructed with authentic 5 pocket styling: (1) watch pocket, (2) front scoop pockets, (2) back spade pockets.
SIGNATURE DETAILS. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure, waistband logo patch and tonal W embroidery on the back pockets for that classic Wrangler style.
